message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with at the moment. I'm willing to pay $105 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of that, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $110 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering both our positions.
